title: Bug report
content:
When I woke up this morning there was a message on my phone (which was on and charging overnight): Tap for bug report. Since nothing else would work (my touch start didn’t work) I tapped it and it went into an endless “Pixel is loading”... it never loaded, so I finally turned it off and when I turned it on, all is well. What was that? And should I be worried?
Thanks!
